results.title: A Novel Case of Metformin-Induced Pancreatitis in an Individual With Normal Dosing and No Underlying Chronic Kidney Disease
results.text_hl: A diagnosis of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010195 @@@pancreatitis@@@ was thus established.

results.title: Metformin aggravates pancreatitis by regulating the release of oxidised mitochondrial DNA via the frataxin (FXN)/ninjurin 1 (NINJ1) signalling pathway.
results.text_hl: EXPERIMENTAL APPROACH: Network pharmacology was employed to investigate the potential effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010195 @@@pancreatitis@@@ and to predict its underlying molecular mechanisms.

results.title: Dysregulation of the glycoprotein zymogen granules in pancreatic acinar cells in acute pancreatitis: differential protection by vitamin E and metformin.
results.text_hl: Dysregulation of the glycoprotein zymogen granules in pancreatic acinar cells in @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010195 @@@acute pancreatitis@@@: differential protection by @CHEMICAL_Vitamin_E @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014810 @@@vitamin E@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: A Case Report on Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@toxicity@@@ was a concern in the setting of @DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute kidney failure@@@ secondary to @DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@gastrointestinal losses@@@ due to @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010195 @@@acute pancreatitis@@@.

results.title: Declining incidence of hypoglycaemia in diabetes secondary to chronic pancreatitis: A nationwide cohort study from 2003 to 2022.
results.text_hl: This coincided with a shift from @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ to analogue @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ and an increase in the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in individuals with @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010195 @@@pancreatic diabetes@@@.

results.title: Ameliorative effect of curcumin and zinc oxide nanoparticles on multiple mechanisms in obese rats with induced type 2 diabetes
results.text_hl: Further, administration of ZnONPs, CurNPs, conventional @CHEMICAL_Curcumin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003474 @@@curcumin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Zinc_Sulfate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019287 @@@ZnSO4@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Zinc_Sulfate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019287 @@@zinc sulfate@@@), as well as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, effectively counteracted @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@-induced oxidative stress and @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ in the internal hepatic @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010195 @@@and pancreatic@@@ tissues.

citations.NLM: Abdulmalek S, Eldala A, Awad D, Balbaa M. Ameliorative effect of curcumin and zinc oxide nanoparticles on multiple mechanisms in obese rats with induced type 2 diabetes Sci Rep. 2021 Oct 19;11(1):20677. PMID: 34667196

results.title: The metformin administration on pancreatic tissue damage in metastatic rat prostate cancer and STZ induced diabetes model.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ alleviates @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ and @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ induced @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010195 @@@pancreatic cytotoxicity@@@ by regulating oxidative stress and antioxidant capacity.

citations.NLM: Koroglu P, Ertik O, Bulan OK, Yanardag R. The metformin administration on pancreatic tissue damage in metastatic rat prostate cancer and STZ induced diabetes model. J Mol Histol. 2025 Jun 21;56(4):201. PMID: 40542925

results.title: Metformin and Everolimus: A Promising Combination for Neuroendocrine Tumors Treatment
results.text_hl: The aims of this study are to evaluate the anticancer effects of the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Everolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068338 @@@everolimus@@@ combination, the molecular mechanism involved in its action in @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010195 @@@pancreatic and pulmonary@@@ @DISEASE_Neuroendocrine_Tumors @DISEASE_MESH:D018358 @@@NET@@@ cells and the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @CHEMICAL_Everolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068338 @@@everolimus@@@-resistant @DISEASE_Neuroendocrine_Tumors @DISEASE_MESH:D018358 @@@NET@@@ cells.

results.title: An Atypical Presentation of a Pyogenic Liver Abscess Caused by Fusobacterium nucleatum Post-ruptured Appendix
results.text_hl: Here, we discuss a 49-year-old male with a past medical history significant for drug-induced @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010195 @@@pancreatitis@@@ from @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type II diabetes@@@, @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@, and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ who presented with @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@right upper quadrant pain@@@.

citations.NLM: Rathi H, Fatima F, Hassan T, Schultz K. An Atypical Presentation of a Pyogenic Liver Abscess Caused by Fusobacterium nucleatum Post-ruptured Appendix Cureus. 2023 Aug;15(8):e42895. PMID: 37664352
